exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce c_n to an evaluable reference.
In environment d : nat m : mon (S d) Unable to unify "m" with "c_n d (pmon1 (S d) m) (pmon2 (S d) m)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : nat) (m : mon (S d)), c_n d (pmon1 (S d) m) (pmon2 (S d) m) = m

Premises:
c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
pmon2 : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon (Init.Nat.pred d)
pmon1 : forall d : nat, mon d -> nat
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
mon_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Type, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
mon_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Prop, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
mon_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Set, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
mon_sind : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> SProp, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
recomp_ok : forall (d : nat) (h : d <> 0) (m : mon d), recomp d h m = m
recomp : forall d : nat, d <> 0 -> mon d -> mon d

beq_nat_eq : forall n m : nat, true = (n =? m) -> n = m
Nat.add_succ_r : forall n m : nat, n + S m = S (n + m)
Nat.add_succ_l : forall n m : nat, S n + m = S (n + m)

Inductive Exists2 (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t B n -> Prop := Exists2_cons_hd : forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), P x1 x2 ->...-> VectorDef.Exists2 P (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2) Arguments VectorDef.Exists2 {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope {n}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists2_cons_hd {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists2_cons_tl {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope

Nat.double_induction : forall R : nat -> nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) R -> (forall m : nat, R 0 m) -> (forall n : nat, R (S n) 0) -> (forall n m : nat, R n m -> R (S n) (S m)) -> forall n m : nat, R n m
Nat.le_ind_rel : forall R : relation nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) R -> (forall m : nat, R 0 m) -> (forall n m : nat, n <= m -> R n m -> R (S n) (S m)) -> forall n m : nat, n <= m -> R n m

Inductive Forall2 (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t B n -> Prop := Forall2_nil : VectorDef.Forall2 P (VectorDef.nil A) (VectorDef.nil B) | Forall2_cons : forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), P x1 x2 -> VectorDef.Forall2 P v1 v2 -> VectorDef.Forall2 P (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2) Arguments VectorDef.Forall2 {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope {n}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Forall2_nil {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments VectorDef.Forall2_cons {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope
Inductive In (A : Type) (a : A) : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop := In_cons_hd : forall (m : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.In a (VectorDef.cons A a m v) | In_cons_tl : forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.In a v -> VectorDef.In a (VectorDef.cons A x m v) Arguments VectorDef.In {A}%type_scope _ {n}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.In_cons_hd {A}%type_scope _ {m}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.In_cons_tl {A}%type_scope _ {m}%nat_scope
Nat.add_assoc : forall n m p : nat, n + (m + p) = n + m + p
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P x -> VectorDef.Exists P (VectorDef.cons A x m v) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.Exists P v -> VectorDef.Exists P (VectorDef.cons A x m v) Arguments VectorDef.Exists {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {n}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists_cons_hd {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists_cons_tl {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope
Fin.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) -> Type, (forall n : nat, P n Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p -> P (S n) (Fin.FS p)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p
Ndigits.Nbit0_Blow : forall (n : nat) (bv : Bvector.Bvector (S n)), BinNat.N.odd (Ndigits.Bv2N bv) = Bvector.Blow n bv

VectorDef.last = fun A : Type => @VectorDef.rectS A (fun (n : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n)) => A) (fun a : A => a) (fun (_ : A) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)) (H : (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => A) n v) => H) : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)), (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => A) n v Arguments VectorDef.last {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
